package.name: Renkoo
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long: Renkoo has a cool fading effect with each incoming message. It also includes smooth scrolling. This however may be slow. So Renkoo Naked was born to bring the beautiful message style some needed speed. It has all of the color combos and everything you like about Renkoo, minus the fading and smooth scroll features. This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=2160 The images, css and html is dual licensed under the BSD and AFL license. The source files for the bubbles can be found at http://www.itorrey.com/adiumx/ The fading javascript is not covered in this license. The code is fadomatic and is covered under its own license as set by its author.
